<Heading

>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}/transfers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of transfers associated with the specified account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"account_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"},"description":"The ID of the account"},{"name":"page[size]","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100},"example":50,"description":"The number of transfers to return"},{"name":"page[next]","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"g3QAAAABdw...","description":"Cursor for the next page (value returned in `pagination.next`)"},{"name":"page[prev]","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"g3QAAAABdw...","description":"Cursor for the previous page (value returned in `pagination.prev`)"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of transfers","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"Transfer","type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","description":"Lifecycle stage of the transfer","enum":["pending","processing","complete","canceled"],"example":"pending"},"amount":{"title":"Amount","type":"object","description":"Monetary value with explicit currency","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"value":{"type":"string","example":"11234.88"},"currency":{"type":"string","example":"USD"}},"required":["value","currency"]},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2025-02-05T19:39:14.316Z"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2025-02-05T19:39:14.316Z"},"source":{"title":"TransferEndpoint","type":"object","properties":{"value_type":{"type":"string","example":"USD"},"transfer_type":{"type":"string","example":"wire"},"address_id":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"}},"required":["address_id","value_type","transfer_type"]},"destination":{"title":"TransferEndpoint","type":"object","properties":{"value_type":{"type":"string","example":"USD"},"transfer_type":{"type":"string","example":"wire"},"address_id":{"title":"Kusid","type":"string","format":"ksuid","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{26}$","example":"2VcUIIsgARwVbEGlIYbhg6fGG57"}},"required":["address_id","value_type","transfer_type"]}}}}}}}}}
